ygData.subject: RE: Limit on song memorization
ygData.msgSnippet: I know I can reconfigure my socials, I do it as needed. But some of them I dont want to lose, and I am about out of buttons to reconfigure. There are about 12
ygData.messageBody:
I know I can reconfigure my socials, I do it as needed. But some of them I
dont want to lose, and I am about out of buttons to reconfigure. There are
about 12 pet commands, and maybe 6 you would use on a charmed pet.
-----Original Message-----
From: John Kim [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 11:15 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Limit on song memorization


From: John Kim <kim@...>

On Wed, 28 Jul 1999, Chris Kuenster (Entex) wrote:

> I am also ticked that when Verant patched last week to 'fix' the missed
> notes on higher level songs, I now miss notes on all my songs even Selo
and
> Hymn. I never use to miss notes on Chain till this patch, anyone else
having
> a problem twisting because of this? It throws my whol rhythm if I miss a
> note and then have to re-sing the song.

Yup. Not only that, the frequency with which mobs were
breaking out of song effects seems to have increased (either
that or the random number generator is really crappy). I mean
at level 29, you'd think a green drybone wouldn't be able to
instantly break out of four Chains in a row.

> Another feature I would like to see is a pop-up to one side that has all
the
> pet commands. Anytime you have a pet to control either you have this popup
> or a button like social that lists all the pet commands.

If you right-click on a social button, you can rename and
reconfigure it. Create buttons for all your favorite pet
commands and put them on your hotkeys.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
